details:
llc: only change llc->dev when bind() succeeds

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.18 by commit 313ab7d716675b12cfde3d78981f21785b139279, it was introduced in version v5.16.18 by commit 6f5bf395c60ed2643de51f2b1041cb0882e9d97f. For more details please see the references link.
summary: llc: only change llc->dev when bind() succeeds
